name: J. Bookwalter Vintner's Select Cabernet Sauvignon 1996
notes:
Aged in French, Hungarian, and American Oak barrels, this is a big voluptuous wine made in Bordeaux style that will age for years. 
Aromas of cherry, cedar, cassis, and chocolate, coupled with a velvety finish, give this wine a smooth, mouth filling memory of Cabernet Sauvignon.
